title: Resistance Becomes Unbearable (2U79)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Wraith
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Maneuver: Exert a twilight Nazgul to exert the Ring-bearer.If the Ring-bearer is then exhausted, he puts on The One Ring until the regroup phase.
Lore:	“Not with the hope of escape, or of doing anything, either good or bad: he simply felt that he must take the Ring and put it on his finger.”
Rarity:	U
